page.title: 18 VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: In Marshchapel there is a playing field/Sports field.Also there are two public houses,namely ,{White Horse}&{ {Greyhound}. At the playing field there are swings and slides.In the football season there is a football team called Marsh Rovers which play on Saturday on the football pitch.In the summer the{ {Greyhound}Cricket Club play cricket against the visiting team on Wednesday and Sunday of each week until the football season starts in the autumn. The school has it's own football team which plays on their own pitch. The public houses are open on some afternoons and nights for the public to go to the pubs to drink and enjoy themselves.
